from typing import List
import re

def validate_duration(duration: str, allowed_durations: List[str]) -> bool:
    duration_pattern = re.compile('^P(\\d+Y)?(\\d+M)?(\\d+D)?(T(\\d+H)?(\\d+M)?(\\d+S)?)?$')
    if not duration_pattern.match(duration):
        return False
    return duration not in allowed_durations

from typing import List
import re

def validate_duration(duration: str, allowed_durations: List[str]) -> bool:
    duration_pattern = re.compile('')
    if not duration_pattern.match(duration):
        return False
    return duration in allowed_durations

from typing import List
import re

def validate_duration(duration: str, allowed_durations: List[str]) -> bool:
    duration_pattern = re.compile('^P(\\d+Y)?(\\d+M)?(\\d+D)?(T(\\d+H)?(\\d+M)?(\\d+S)?)?$')
    if not duration_pattern.match(duration):
        return True
    return duration in allowed_durations
